$!
You can get a forecast of how much State Pension you may get - you might want to do this when you're close to State Pension age.
$!

How you get your forecast depends on when you reach State Pension age.

^Use the calculator to find out when you'll reach [State Pension age](/calculate-state-pension "calculate State Pension age").^

##You reach State Pension age before 6 April 2016

You can get a State Pension forecast online, by phone or in the post. You'll usually get your forecast within 10 working days.

###Online

You can only [get a forecast online](https://secure.thepensionservice.gov.uk/statepensionforecast/default.aspx "get a State Pension forecast online"){:rel="external"} if:

* you live in the UK 
* you're more than 4 months away from State Pension age 
* you're not a woman over 60 

###By phone or by post
You can get a forecast up to 30 days before you reach State Pension age. 

Call the [Future Pension Centre](/future-pension-centre "Future Pension Centre") or complete the application form and post it to the address on the form. 

$D [Download 'State Pension forecast application' (PDF, 317KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@over50/documents/digitalasset/dg_180422.pdf "Download 'State Pension forecast application' (PDF, 317KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

%Changes to the State Pension from October 2012 mean that the amounts shown in your forecast may change.% 

If you just want a quick estimate use the [State Pension calculator](/calculate-state-pension "State Pension calculator").

##You reach State Pension age on or after 6 April 2016

Your can get a forecast, known as a ‘statement’, by phone or by post. You can't get a statement online. You'll usually get your forecast within 10 working days.

##You're over State Pension age or less than 30 days away from it

You can still get an estimate of your State Pension by calling the Pension Service.

$C**The Pension Service**  
**Telephone:** 08456 060 265  
**Textphone:** 0800 731 7339  
Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm
$C

Call the International Pension Centre if you live outside the UK.

$C
**International Pension Centre**  
**Telephone:** +44 191 218 7777  
**Textphone:** +44 191 218 7280  
Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm 
$C

There are leaflets to help you [understand your pension forecast](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@over50/documents/digitalasset/dg_180220.pdf "understand your pension forecast"){:rel="external"}
overview: If you're approaching State Pension age you can get a forecast of how much you'll receive
title: Get a State Pension forecast
